solution_line_template: 65% of women are opposed to the idea because {total_percent} - {women_in_favor_percent} = <<{total_percent}-{women_in_favor_percent}={women_opposed_percent}>>{women_opposed_percent}
There are {total_women_polled} women in the poll because {women_opposed_count} / {women_opposed_decimal} = <<{women_opposed_count}/{women_opposed_decimal}={total_women_polled}>>{total_women_polled}

There were {total_people_polled} people in her poll because {total_women_polled} / {women_percentage_of_total} = <<{total_women_polled}/{women_percentage_of_total}={total_people_polled}>>{total_people_polled}
